About Me

Hi, I'm Developer from Latvia.

I'm a Self taught Developer with a focus on Back End Development.

I like checking out open source projects and sharing my own code on Github .

I have experience in Java, Kotlin, Dart and C++.

I am passionate about investing and I'm planning to share my experience.
